rows.label: qst201328_0010
rows.name: Hehe... What a shame, what a shame...

rows.label: qst201328_0020
rows.name:
You put up quite a fight, but I doubt you can
do much while protecting those children.

rows.label: qst201328_0030
rows.name:
This is the limit for a
single Blade... isn't it?

rows.label: qst201328_0040
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]Hmph.

rows.label: qst201328_0050
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]Hehe... Heeheehee...

rows.label: qst201328_0060
rows.name:
...From the looks of it, you're a
rather exceptional Blade, aren't you?

rows.label: qst201328_0070
rows.name:
How about it? Would you
like to cooperate with me?

rows.label: qst201328_0080
rows.name:
If you'll assist in my experiments,
I might even let the children go.

rows.label: qst201328_0090
rows.name: ...Do not mock me.

rows.label: qst201328_0100
rows.name:
Even that wretched Nopon managed
to create an artificial Blade.

rows.label: qst201328_0110
rows.name: Why can't I succeed?

rows.label: qst201328_0120
rows.name:
I was pondering that, but
when I saw you, it hit me...

rows.label: qst201328_0130
rows.name:
Modifying children to become Blades
was not a good method at all.

rows.label: qst201328_0140
rows.name: But what if I used a real Blade?

rows.label: qst201328_0150
rows.name:
It would surely succeed, right? I could
create the strongest Blade in all of Alst!

rows.label: qst201328_0160
rows.name:
There's no way a genius like
me could lose to a Nopon!

rows.label: qst201328_0170
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]Hehe... Heeheehee... Hehehe...

rows.label: qst201328_0180
rows.name:
Nonsense... As if anyone would
listen to the words of a deviant...

rows.label: qst201328_0190
rows.name:
Oh my, oh my. Are you sure
you should say that?

rows.label: qst201328_0200
rows.name:
Just a single nod from you guarantees
the lives of these children.

rows.label: qst201328_0210
rows.name:
Or can you break through this
situation, outnumbered as you are?

rows.label: qst201328_0220
rows.name:
I think you should consider your answer
very carefully... wouldn't you agree?

rows.label: qst201328_0230
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]Hehe... Heeheehee...

rows.label: qst201328_0240
rows.name: Miss...

rows.label: qst201328_0250
rows.name:
It's all right... I will protect
you all, no matter what.

rows.label: qst201328_0260
rows.name: I see...

rows.label: qst201328_0270
rows.name:
If I alone sacrifice myself, you
will let all the children go?

rows.label: qst201328_0280
rows.name: Yes, yes. You're starting to understand.

rows.label: qst201328_0290
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]Heeheehee...

rows.label: qst201328_0300
rows.name: That is a rather tempting offer...

rows.label: qst201328_0310
rows.name: Is it a deal, then?

rows.label: qst201328_0320
rows.name:
But did you really think I
would trust such words?

rows.label: qst201328_0330
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]Hm?

rows.label: qst201328_0340
rows.name:
Scum like you would never let someone
who knows your secrets go free.

rows.label: qst201328_0350
rows.name:
You intend to dispose of the children
after you have my body, don't you?

rows.label: qst201328_0360
rows.name:
I will protect these children to the end.
I will never let you have your way.

rows.label: qst201328_0370
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]Hehe... Heeheehee... Hehehehehe...

rows.label: qst201328_0380
rows.name:
...My, you're a clever one.
I like you more and more.

rows.label: qst201328_0390
rows.name:
But I can't say I appreciate
your defiance...

rows.label: qst201328_0400
rows.name:
If you keep this up, everyone
will end up unhappy, you know?

rows.label: qst201328_0410
rows.name:
After I kill the children, you'll be experimented on
until you're nothing but a wreck, and then you'll die.

rows.label: qst201328_0420
rows.name: ...I will not let that happen.

rows.label: qst201328_0430
rows.name:
Even if I have to take you down with
me, I will save these children.

rows.label: qst201328_0440
rows.name:
What a fool... Don't
throw your life away.

rows.label: qst201328_0450
rows.name: Oh wait, Blades don't die, do they...

rows.label: qst201328_0460
rows.name:
But you lose your memories, right?
That's no different from dying, is it?

rows.label: qst201328_0470
rows.name: Even if this body of mine perishes...

rows.label: qst201328_0480
rows.name:
Even if I lose everything
in the process...

rows.label: qst201328_0490
rows.name:
My will and my feelings
will be carried on.

rows.label: qst201328_0500
rows.name: ...What?

rows.label: qst201328_0510
rows.name:
Do you not understand, deviant? This
will is eternal and unchanging...

rows.label: qst201328_0520
rows.name:
Even if I am gone, someone
will surely punish you.

rows.label: qst201328_0530
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]Hehehehe...

rows.label: qst201328_0540
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]Hehe... Heeheehee... Hyahyahyahyahya!

rows.label: qst201328_0550
rows.name:
Enough. I have no need
for a Blade like you.

rows.label: qst201328_0560
rows.name: Dispose of them all.

rows.label: qst201328_0570
rows.name: What?!

rows.label: qst201328_0580
rows.name: Tokiha! Are you all right?

rows.label: qst201328_0590
rows.name: Sorry we're late.

rows.label: qst201328_0600
rows.name: Not at all. Your timing is perfect.

rows.label: qst201328_0610
rows.name: Now, let us begin the counterattack.
